articles.title: Severe blow to Chinese billionaire Jack Ma, Tata Group snatches BigBasket from Alibaba - Zee News
articles.description: Tata group is acquiring 68 percent stake in online grocery platform BigBasket for around Rs 9,500 crore. Chinese internet giant Alibaba has about 30 percent stake in BigBasket.
